alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued July 11 at 6:25AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 9 AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rain passing ove the islands. WHERE...Tutuila, Aunuu, Manua WHEN...Through 9 AM IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Line of clouds moving in from the south is bringing heavy rain over the islands. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 624 TAEAO ASO GAFUA IULAI 11 2022 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 9 AM... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa o loo i lugta le autnuu. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunuu, ma Manua TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 9 AM AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O laina ao o lo`o aga`i mai saute o le atunu`u ua faapea ona aumaia timuga mamafa i luga o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
